column2: "Iyi nye ahyɛmu a EWURADZE hyɛɛ Moses dɛ ɔnye Israelmba ndzi wɔ Moab asaase do
column3: nka ahyɛmu a ɔnye hɔn dzii wɔ Horeb no ho no

column2: "Na Moses frɛɛ Israel nyinara
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom ehu adze nyinara a EWURADZE dze yɛɛ Farao

column2: "nsɔhwɛ akɛse a w’enyiwa hunii
column3: nsɛnkyerɛdze

column2: "naaso obodu ndɛ da yi
column3: EWURADZE mmaa wo dɛm akoma a onyim dze

column2: "Na medzi hom enyim ma hom anantsew mfe eduanan wɔ sar no do; hom ntar nnsuwii wɔ hom ho
column3: na wo mpaboa nntsetsewee wɔ w’ananadze."

column2: "Hom nndzii paanoo
column3: nkyii so hom nnoom wenyin anaa nsa dzendzen: ama hom eehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na aber a hom dur bea yi do no
column3: Hesbonhen Sihon
column5: fiir edzi baa hɛn do nye hɛn bɔkoe

column2: "na yɛfaa hɔn asaase
column3: na yɛdze maa Reubenfo

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ndzi ahyɛmu yi mu nsɛm do
column3: na hom nyɛ
column4: na hom aayɛ prɔmprɔm wɔ dza hom yɛ nyinara mu."

column2: "Ndɛ da yi hom nyinara hom ngyina EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn enyim; hom etsitsir
column3: hom ebusuakuw ebusuakuw
column10: nye wo hɔhoe a ɔwɔ wo nseraban mu
column11: ofi wo duatwafo do dze kodu wo nsusawfo do:"

column2: "ama aahɛn EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn n’ahyɛmu
column3: nye ne nsew a Ɔnye wo ridzi ndɛ da yi mu:"

column2: "ama ɔdze wo eesi hɔ ndɛ da yi dɛ ɔman ama noho
column3: na ɔno so aayɛ Nyankopɔn ama wo
column5: na dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ w’egyanom

column2: "Nkyii so nnyɛ hom nko na menye hom ridzi ahyɛmu yi nye nsew yi:"
"mbom menye nyia ɔnye hɛn gyina EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn enyim ha ndɛ da yi
column3: na eso menye nyia ɔnnye hɛn nnyi ha ndɛ da yi:"

column2: "(na hom nyim mbrɛ yesii tsenaa Egypt asaase do; na mbrɛ yesii twaa mu wɔ amanaman a hom faa hɔn mu baa no mu;"
"na hom ehu hɔn ekyiwadze
column3: na hɔn abosom
column5: dwetɛ nye sika a ɔwɔ hɔn mu no:)"

column2: "Na hom nhwɛ yie amma hom mu ɔbanyin bi
column3: anaa ɔbaa bi
column5: anaa ebusuakuw bi n’akoma anndan ndɛ da yi emmfi EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ho
column6: dɛ ɔrokɔ akɔsom amanaman no hɔn enyame no: na ndwow bi aammba hom mu a ɔsow bɔr nye ɔbɔwen;"

column2: "na aammba dɛ
column3: sɛ ɔtse mpaa yi mu nsɛm a
column7: kaansa menam m’akoma no sorow mu mpo a
column8: amma wɔaannsɛɛ dza afɔw annka dza awow ho."

column2: "EWURADZE remmfa nnkyɛ no
column3: na mbom EWURADZE n’ebufuw nye ne nyinkuntwe bopun nyimpa no
column4: na mpaa a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu no nyinara bodwir no do
column5: na EWURADZE bɛpepa ne dzin efi asaase do."

column2: "Na EWURADZE beyi no efi Israel ebusuakuw nyinara mu esi hɔ ama mbusu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ahyɛmu a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ mbra nwoma yi mu mpaa no tse nyinara."

column2: "Na ebusuasantsen a wɔbɛba no
column3: hom mba a wɔbɔsoɛr edzi hom ekyir no
column4: nye ɔnanaben a ofi ekyirekyir asaase do bɛba no
column5: sɛ wohu asaase no do yardɔm
column6: nye nyarbanyarba a EWURADZE dze ama wɔayar no a

column2: "n’asaase nyinara ayɛ sɔɔfee nye nkyen
column3: nye nkyewee
column8: Adma nye Zeboim mbutuwii a EWURADZE nam n’ebufuw nye n’ebufuhyew mu butuwii no:"

column2: "mekyerɛ amanaman nyinara bɛse dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze ntsi na EWURADZE ayɛ asaase yi dɛm yi? Ebufuw kɛse hyeehyew yi ase nye dɛn?"

column2: "Nna nkorɔfo bɛse dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ wɔpoow EWURADZE
column4: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn ahyɛmu a oyii hɔn wɔ Egypt asaase do no ɔnye hɔn dzii no;"

column2: "na wɔkɔree kɔsoom enyame fofor
column3: na wɔsɔɔr hɔn

column2: "dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE ebufuw dzɛwee wɔ asaase yi do
column3: ma ɔdze mpaa a wɔakyerɛw no wɔ nwoma yi mu nyinara aba do;"

column2: "na EWURADZE tutuu hɔn ase fii hɔn asaase do wɔ ebufuw
column3: nye ebufuhyew
column5: na wɔatow hɔn egu asaase bi so do
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Ndzɛmba a osuma yɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze: na ndzɛmba a wɔada no edzi no dze ɔyɛ hɛn nye hɛn mba dze daa
column3: ama yeedzi mbra yi mu nsɛm nyinara do."
